modName: PS Armored Chainmail Bikini UNPB BBP and 7B BBP
summary: 9 color variations [each] of UNPB BBP and SevenBase BBP armored chainmail bikini.  Good [and compatible] for fashion mesh up with Nightasy and Brokefoot's Hmm What to Wear series.  Included with PS ColorThatArmor mask for recolorization.
descriptionHtml:
[b][youtube]PxX2NK3TO0w[/youtube]

[heading] [color=yellow] Special thanks to [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBRmzqswNKBPnUZW2df3DPw]VatiWah[/url] for the video review [/color]


[/b]9 color variations of UNPB BBP and SevenBase BBP armored chainmail bikini.  

They are all craftable (leather) and temperable.

Good for fashion mesh up with Nightasy and Brokefoot's Hmm What to Wear series (see pictures).  

Use PS ColorThatArmor (Link BELOW) mask to generate new colors and variations.[b][/heading] [/b]


[b][heading] This work is retext and reorganization of armors made by these hardworking modders : [/heading]
[/b]- ortog for UNP Armored Bikini
- hagrid for UNP Armored Bikini Leather texture
- rockslinger for UNP armored bikini retextures
- Kaleeon for Kaleeons Armored Bikini Retexture
- MrTroubleMaker and b3lisario for UNPB Conversion
- Shocky for Sevenbase Conversion


[heading] [color=yellow]My Old Mods [/color][/heading]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54529/?]- PS ColorThatArmor :  (How this mod could be made within less than 2 hours - Coloring process only 5 mins too)
Quickly recolor any armors you like
 [img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/54529-1-1401640995.jpg[/img]
[/url]

(Gloves and boots ladies are wearing in the pictures)
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/53925-1-1399744223.jpg[/img][/url]

Really useful quick tool for body testing and prototyping

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46823]- PS Customizable UNIQUE Combat Companions with In-Game Body Changer : 
How can modder's mod collection be complete without follwers? All the models you see in here and from my pictures are these ladies

author: oscarvonreuenthal
